name: Buildarea LCD
description: Found inside the house of [REDACTED] After she [REDACTED] due to on-going mental episodes. it appears to be a mock-up of a "Tiger Handheld" Version of the game found on her computer titled "Buildarea Quest".  Despite branding on the unit and "Manual" found with it, the device is complete home-brew and has no affiliation with Tiger Electronics™ and their line of hand-held electronic games. This is further evidence she suffered from delusions of grandeur. Viewing her video game development as an almost "Saintly" task.  As there is nothing abnormal about the unit itself. [REDACTED] has Allowed it to be reconstructed and distributed.
